summary: This document is a certification for UBS Financial Services Inc. regarding the establishment of accounts for EILMAX, LLC. It outlines the authority of the members or managers of the LLC to conduct various financial transactions and the responsibilities of UBS in relation to these accounts. Ghislaine Maxwell is identified as a managing member of the LLC.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell is identified as the managing member of EILMAX, LLC, which is establishing accounts with UBS Financial Services.

keyFacts: The document certifies the authority of members of EILMAX, LLC to establish accounts with UBS Financial Services.
Ghislaine Maxwell is listed as the managing member of EILMAX, LLC.
The document outlines the powers granted to authorized persons of the LLC regarding financial transactions.
UBS is protected from liability based on the representations made in this certification.
The certification remains in effect until revoked in writing.
